entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
